code: import{save,load,remove}from'react-cookies';import routes from'core/constants/routes';import{clearCircleId}from'./circle';import{clearProfile}from'./profile';import{clearApplication}from'./workspace';import{getCookieOptions}from'./domain';var accessTokenKey='access-token';var refreshTokenKey='refresh-token';export var setAccessToken=function setAccessToken(token){return save(accessTokenKey,token,getCookieOptions());};export var setRefreshToken=function setRefreshToken(token){return save(refreshTokenKey,token,getCookieOptions());};export var getAccessToken=function getAccessToken(){return load(accessTokenKey);};export var getRefreshToken=function getRefreshToken(){return load(refreshTokenKey);};export var isLogged=function isLogged(){return getAccessToken()&&getRefreshToken();};export var clearSession=function clearSession(){remove(accessTokenKey,getCookieOptions());remove(refreshTokenKey,getCookieOptions());clearCircleId();clearProfile();clearApplication();};export var logout=function logout(){clearSession();window.location.href=routes.login;};
